introduction:
Hi! My name is Aleksi. I live in Japan and I'm a software developer by profession.
Outside of work I like to spend time with my family and in the gym.
details:
My greatest passion and drive is to constantly better myself.
Be it musical instruments (Guitar and bass), coding or lifting weights, I strive to be at least an inch better at something than I was yesterday.
When it comes to work, I have a 7+ years of experience with React, and TypeScript, and have worked on both BtoB and BtoC -projects.
I have also been part of frontend hiring committees, and lead several recruitment interviews.
